title: Building Resilient Microservices with Circuit Breakers
long_description_program_committee: This talk explores how to implement circuit breaker patterns in microservices architectures to improve system resilience. We'll cover practical examples using popular frameworks and demonstrate real-world failure scenarios.
session_outline:
1. Introduction to circuit breakers (5 min)
2. Implementation patterns (15 min)
3. Real-world case studies (8 min)
4. Q&A (2 min)
audience_take_aways: Attendees will learn how to implement circuit breakers, understand when to use them, and see practical examples of improving system resilience.
other_notes_program_committee_chairs: This is a timely topic for our audience.

title: Monitoring at Scale: Lessons from Managing 10k+ Services
long_description_program_committee: A deep dive into monitoring strategies for large-scale distributed systems. This talk covers metric collection, alerting strategies, and visualization techniques that have proven effective in production environments with thousands of services.
session_outline:
1. Scale challenges overview (10 min)
2. Metric collection strategies (15 min)
3. Alerting best practices (15 min)
4. Visualization and dashboards (3 min)
5. Q&A (2 min)
audience_take_aways: Practical monitoring strategies, alerting patterns, and tooling recommendations for large-scale systems.

title: Database Performance Tuning in Cloud Environments
long_description_program_committee: This session covers database performance optimization techniques specific to cloud environments. Topics include auto-scaling considerations, network latency optimization, and cost-effective storage strategies.
session_outline:
1. Cloud database challenges (5 min)
2. Performance optimization techniques (20 min)
3. Cost considerations (3 min)
4. Q&A (2 min)
audience_take_aways: Attendees will learn cloud-specific database tuning techniques and cost optimization strategies.
other_notes_program_committee_chairs: Great practical content for our database track.
